summary: Completed comprehensive testing of solar energy monitoring application. All backend APIs working perfectly (100% success rate). Frontend functionality fully operational with successful GROWATT and MPPSOLAR inverter creation, real-time data updates, navigation, and chart interactions.

design_issues.details: Console warnings about chart dimensions, but charts display correctly

design_issues.details: Accessibility warnings for dialog components, functionality works correctly
